shortdesc.ph: Reports that the receiver has received the to-be-decoded video frame sent by the remote end.

p.codeblock: virtual bool onEncodedVideoFrameReceived(rtc::uid_t uid, const uint8_t* imageBuffer, size_t length, const rtc::EncodedVideoFrameInfo& videoEncodedFrameInfo) = 0;
final void Function(int uid, Uint8List imageBuffer, int length, EncodedVideoFrameInfo videoEncodedFrameInfo)? onEncodedVideoFrameReceived;

section.p: If you call the method and set encodedFrameOnly to , the SDK triggers this callback locally to report the received encoded video frame information.

plentry.pd: The user ID of the remote user.

pd.props: cpp unity android electron rn flutter

plentry.props: cpp unity ios mac electron rn flutter
plentry.pd: The data length of the video image.
For the information of the encoded video frame, see .
